    vs_3_0
    def c23, 0.0078125, 0, 0, 0
    def c22, 0.5, 65280, 255, -32768
    def c21, 1, -1, 0, 2
    def c17, 1, 0, 0, 0
    def c18, 0, 1, 0, 0
    def c19, 0, 0, 1, 0
    def c20, 0, 0, 0, 1
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_texcoord o0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord1 o1
    dcl_texcoord4 o2
    dcl_position o3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mul r0, c14.wwyy, v0.xyxy
    mad r1, r0.yxxy, c21.xxyy, c21.zzxx
    add r2, r1, r1
    add r0.x, v0.y, v0.x
    slt r0.x, c14.z, r0.x
    slt r0.y, v0.x, v0.y
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c21.w, r0.y
    mad r1, r1, -c21.w, c21.x
    mul r1, r1, c15
    mad r1, r2, c14.x, r1
    mova a0.x, r0.x
    dp4 r0.x, r1, c17[a0.x]
    frc r0.y, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.y, r0.x
    mov r1.x, c17.x
    if_lt c14.x, r1.x
      add r1.y, r0.y, -c13.x
      add r1.z, r0.x, c17.x
      mul r1.y, r1.z, r1.y
      add_sat r1.y, r1.y, r1.y
    else
      add r0.y, r0.y, -c13.x
      mul_sat r1.y, r0.y, c13.y
    endif
    exp r0.y, -r0.x
    mad r2.xy, c16.x, r0.y, -r1.x
    add r0.y, -r0.x, -c17.x
    exp r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.y, r0.y, c16.x
    max r0.y, r0.y, c21.w
    add r2.zw, r0.y, -c17.x
    mul r2, r2, c16.y
    mad r3, r0.zwzw, r2, c22.x
    frc r4, r3
    add r3, r3, -r4
    rcp r0.y, r2.y
    mul r2.xy, r0.y, r3
    mad r0.yz, r2.xxyw, c11.xxyw, c11.xzww
    mov r3.xy, c11
    mad r4.xy, r3, c22.x, r0.yzzw
    add r4.w, r0.x, -c13.z
    mov r4.z, c17.w
    texldl r0, r4, s0
    mul r0.xy, r0, c22.yzzw
    add r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    add r0.x, r0.x, c22.w
    mul r2.z, r0.x, c23.x
    rcp r0.x, r2.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, r3.zwzw
    mad r1.xz, r0.xyyw, c11.xyyw, c11.zyww
    mad r5.xy, r3, c22.x, r1.xzzw
    add r5.zw, r4, c17.xyyx
    texldl r4, r5, s0
    mul r1.xz, r4.xyyw, c22.yyzw
    add r0.w, r1.z, r1.x
    add r0.w, r0.w, c22.w
    mul r0.z, r0.w, c23.x
    lrp r4.xyz, r1.y, r0, r2
    mul r0, r4.y, c7
    mad r0, c6, r4.x, r0
    mad r0, c8, r4.z, r0
    add r0, r0, c9
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mul r1.x, r0.w, c10.z
    mad r0.xy, r1.x, c10, r0
    mad r1.xy, r4, c11, c11.zwzw
    mad r1.xy, r3, c22.x, r1
    mad o1.zw, r4.xyxy, c12.xyxy, c12
    mov o0.xy, r1
    mov o0.z, c17.w
    mov o1.xy, r1

// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-vertex-halo --only-autofixed --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 8A021B1D.txt

add r31.w, r0.w, -r31.y
mad r0.x, r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mov o2, r0
